<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105520</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105520</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085970</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Get your character education act together!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erhalten Sie Ihre Zeichenausbildung Tat zusammen!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Obtenez votre acte d'éducation de caractère 
ensemble !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comece seu ato da instrução do caráter junto!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ottenga insieme il vostro atto di formazione del 
carattere!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συναντηθείτε με τον εκπαιδευτικό νόμο χαρακτήρα σας!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Consiga su acto de la educación del carácter 
junto!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Elements of an effective character education program and lots of ideas for implementation -- all across the curriculum.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elemente eines wirkungsvollen Zeichenausbildung Programms 
und der Lots Ideen für Implementierung -- alle über dem Lehrplan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éléments d'un programme pertinent d'éducation de 
caractère et d'un bon nombre d'idées pour la mise en place -- tous 
à travers le programme d'études.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elementos de um programa eficaz da instrução do caráter
e dos lotes das idéias para a execução -- tudo através do 
curriculum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elementi di un programma efficace di formazione del 
carattere e dei lotti delle idee per l'implementazione -- tutto 
attraverso il programma di studi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία ενός αποτελεσματικού προγράμματος 
εκπαίδευσης χαρακτήρα και των μερών των ιδεών για την εφαρμογή --
όλες πέρα από το πρόγραμμα σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elementos de un programa eficaz y de las porciones de las 
ideas para la puesta en práctica -- todo de la educación del 
carácter a través del plan de estudios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:FRANCES B. LEWIS
FN:FRANCES B. LEWIS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085970</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105520</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/get-your-character-education-act-together</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
